definition.name: The home Screen to the application
definition.definition: The home Screen to the application

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Provide an actor with a 'Home' screen showing current tasks and activities of concern.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Decoration
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Provide common parts for every page.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Screen-Access
Functional-Requirement.description: Restrict screen access

Functional-Requirement.name: Registration-Access
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide an actor with ability to navigate to the registration screen at all times.

description.line: lity to navigate to the r

Functional-Requirement.name: Registration-Access-Restriction
Functional-Requirement.description: Restrict access to Registration navigation.

Functional-Requirement.name: Completed-Projects-Navigation
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide an actor with ability to navigate to Completed Projects.

Functional-Requirement.name: Completed-Projects-Navigation-Restriction
Functional-Requirement.description: Restrict visibility of Completed Projects navigation.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Terms-of-Use
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Provide access to Terms of System Use at all times.

description.line: f System Use at all times

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Terms-of-Use-Legal
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Provide SHPO Legal has final approvel on Terms of System Use.

Functional-Requirement.name: Logout
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide Actor with the ability to intiate a logout from the system.

Functional-Requirement.name: Logout-Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log voluntary and involuntary logouts from the system in Activity-Log. Session expirations should be considerd as a logout.

Functional-Requirement.name: Automatic Logout
Functional-Requirement.description: Actors accessing or attempting to access screen without out the proper privileges will automatically be logged off of the system.Log

description.line: be logged off of the sys

Functional-Requirement.name: Logout-Navigation-Restriction
Functional-Requirement.description: Restrict visibility of Logout.

definition.name: Describes the purpose of the Screen for the reader
definition.definition: Describes the purpose of the Screen for the reader

layout.name: Label
layout.text: Registering will give you immediate access to nominate a property to the National Register of Historic Places. Additional access will depend on your experience and expertise. Some data cannot be disclosed through this web site and to gain access will require a higher level of supervised access. Please answer the questions in this form accurately and to the best of your ability.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Introduction
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Work with SHPO staff to provide/approve text to explain why the guest needs to register.

description.line: Work with SHPO staff to p

definition.name: Describes the purpose of the Screen for the reader
definition.definition: Describes the purpose of the Screen for the reader

layout.name: Label
layout.text: Welcome! Please direct your attention to the task list below.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Registrant-Introduction
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Work with SHPO staff to provide/approve short text prompt actor to review/act-on tasks.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Login
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide Access to System.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Password-Reminder
Functional-Requirement.description: Give an actor the ability to request a reminder of their password, given an email address via return email.

Indirect-Requirement.name: Home-Screen First-Timer
Indirect-Requirement.description: Given a the actor's email address and successful varification, then email the password to the given address. If no password is found then do not send an email and do not report to actor.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Task-List
Functional-Requirement.description: Give actor a task-list to display system tasks that require their attention.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen Tasks-List
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide a method to navigate from Task-List to a project

Screen.name: Request National Register Historic Place Privileges

definition.name: Subscreen for someone to request an NRHP editor account.
definition.definition: Subscreen for someone to request an NRHP editor account.

layout.name: Description
layout.text: If you intend to submit a National Register Preliminarty Questonnaire or a National Register of Historic Places Nomination then you need to request privileges.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen NRHP-Privileges
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide method to request National Register Historic Places privileges.

definition.name: Subscreen for someone to request an ER editor account.
definition.definition: Subscreen for someone to request an ER editor account.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen 106-Privileges
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide method to request 106 Review privileges.

layout.name: Description
layout.text: If you intend to submit a request for a Section 106 Review then you need to request privileges.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen New-NRHP-Project
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide methods to create new National Register Historic Places project.

Functional-Requirement.name: Home-Screen New-HRHP-Project Restriction
Functional-Requirement.description: Restrict the creation of National Register Historic Places Projects.

definition.name: Poke the owner of this task.
definition.definition: Poke the owner of this task.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-Registration-Complete
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide a task to prompt an actor to complete the registration task.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-Registration-Complete-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Remove the Task-Registration-Complete task once all sections of the registration are complete and valid.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Privileges-Request
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide task to prompt an actor to request Request National Register Privileges.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Privileges-Grant
Functional-Requirement.description: Automatically grant National register Privileges when Task-NRHP-Privileges-Request is complete.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Privileges-Request-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Show the Task-NRHP-Privileges-Request prompt after Registant privileges are granted. Remove Task-NRHP-Privileges-Request once NRHP privileges are granted

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Start
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide a perminate task to initiate new NRHPs once privileges are granted.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Start-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Show Task-NRHP-Start once privileges are granted. Remove Task-NRHP-Start when privileges are revoked.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Complete
Functional-Requirement.description: Add task to prompt an actor to complete an incomplete NRHP.

description.line: Add task to prompt an act

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Complete-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Show the Task-NRHP-Complete task once the new NRHP is intiated. Remove the Task-NRHP-Complete task once the NRHP has been submitted for review.

description.line: te task once the new NRHP
nce the NRHP has been sub

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Review
Functional-Requirement.description: Inform an actor that the NRHP is currently under reveiw. Provide Task-Action to allow read-only privileges to the NRHP.

Assumption.name: Task-NRHP-Review-Assumption
Assumption.description: Assuming that owner of the NRHP cannot make changes during the reveiw process.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Review-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Show the Task-NRHP-Review task once the NRHP is submitted for review. Remove the Task once the NRHP has been reviewed.

description.line: task once the NRHP is su
e the Task once the NRHP

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Review-Confirm
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide a task to allow an actor to confirm/acccept the review.

description.line: Provide a task to allow a

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-NRHP-Review-Confirm-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Show Task-NRHP-Review-Confirm after the review has been completed.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-PQ-Start
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide a perminate task in a the task-list to prompt an actor to intiate NRHP Preliminary Questionnaire.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-PQ-Complete
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide to task to prompt an actor to complete a preliminary questionnaire.

Functional-Requirement.description: Remove the Task-PQ-Complete tasks once the PQ has been reviewed and excepted.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-ER
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide a perminate task in the task-list to initiate NRHP Preliminary Questionnaire.

definition.name: Subscreen for someone to confirm a task.
definition.definition: Subscreen for someone to confirm a task.

layout.name: Description
layout.text: As a part of the record you need to confirm acceptance of a task.

Non-Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions
Non-Functional-Requirement.description: Task Actions are buttons attached to specific Task in the Task-List. Use actions to direct/provide an actor with functionality to complete task.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions Go
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide actor with a GO-action to direct them to another screen to complete more complex tasks.

description.line: ction to direct them to a

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions Confirm
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide actor with a Confirm-action to acknowledge acceptance of a task and then remove itself from the task list.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions Confirm Logging
Functional-Requirement.description: Log Confirm-action to the Activity-Log to record acceptance of a task.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions New
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide actor with a New-action to initiate any of the applications/reviews. New buttons are always visible in the task-list.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions Request
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide actor with a Request-action to make requests.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions Request Loggng
Functional-Requirement.description: Log a Request-action to the Activity-Log to record a request. Each request will have specfic message

Functional-Requirement.name: Task Actions Poked
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide actor with a way to remove Pokes from Task-List.

Functional-Requirement.name: Task-Owner Poke
Functional-Requirement.description: Provide actor with ability to poke the action owner. Allow them to poke themselves as reminders. i.e., click on action-owner to initiate poke.

r. Allow them to poke the

Functional-Requirement.name: Poke-Task-Duration
Functional-Requirement.description: Poke tasks should stay in the recipients task list until the recipient clears the poke.

Functional-Requirement.name: Poke-Task-Clearing
Functional-Requirement.description: Poke tasks should stay in the task list until a manager makes the assignment or until the actor has poked.
